=== About me ===

Greetings. My name is Dmitry and I'm from St. Petersburg, Russia. I interested in computer science, programming and lot of others high-tech things. Particularly i very interested in Linux and Unix. Also I want make Ubuntu more popular between PC users.
Today I use Ubuntu for my computers.

=== Activity ===
I:
* do moderator's job on <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu.ru|Russian Community's Forum]]</nowiki> and IRC <nowiki>[[http://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-ru|Freenode Network]]</nowiki> channel
* Helps new users online in the channel #ubuntu-ru.
* Participation in the Install Party, starting with release 8.04.
* Help for new users to install and configure the system. Reading the reports in St. Petersburg, Club Phoenix.
* Support stable operation of an information bot ''ubuntuhelp'' on the channel <nowiki>[[http://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-ru|#ubuntu-ru]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-meeting-ru|#ubuntu-meeting-ru]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-translators-ru|#ubuntu-translators-ru]]</nowiki>.
* Support stable operation of an bridge between IRC and Jabber for the channel <nowiki>[[http://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-meeting-ru|#ubuntu-meeting-ru]]</nowiki>.
* Support for database up to date in Russian <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuhelp.org.ru/ubuntu.db|Ubuntu database]]</nowiki>.
* Application Development based on PyGTK.
* Submitting bug reports.

=== Future plans: ===
* Make ubuntu more popular distribution.
* Begin translating documents into Russian.
